definition: The word "auffällig" refers to something that attracts attention due to its distinctive or conspicuous nature. It is commonly used to describe something or someone that stands out or is noticeable in a noticeable or striking way.

examples.german: Sein auffälliges Verhalten machte ihn verdächtig.
examples.english: His conspicuous behavior made him suspicious.

examples.german: Das auffällige Muster auf ihrem Kleid zog alle Blicke auf sich.
examples.english: The striking pattern on her dress caught everyone's attention.

examples.german: Die auffällige Farbe des Autos machte es leicht zu erkennen.
examples.english: The distinctive color of the car made it easy to recognize.

examples.german: Die auffällige Werbung lockte viele Kunden an.
examples.english: The eye-catching advertisement attracted many customers.

examples.german: Die auffällige Schriftart machte den Text schwer lesbar.
examples.english: The conspicuous font made the text difficult to read.
